name: Remove Category Word From Title
author: Ausaf Malik

sections.description: Remove Category Word From Title is basically used to remove the word Category: from the title when comes when you create a menu as a category. This plugin doesn’t requires any setting, you just need to install and activate it.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Unzip the downloaded zip file.
  2. Upload the plugin folder into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  3. Activate ‘Remove Category Word From Title’ from Plugins page

short_description: Remove Category Word From Title is basically used to remove the word Category: from the title when comes when you create a menu as a category.
